HomePage.subtitle: It is an artificial intelligence tool that automatically converts HTML content into accessible formats, following web accessibility guidelines (WCAG).

RegisterPage.title: Account Registration
RegisterPage.subtitle: Minimum data will be requested to publish articles in your name
RegisterPage.password_constraint: The password must be at least eight (8) characters long
RegisterPage.repeat_password_constraint: The repeated password does not match the first

link.first: Already have an account or don't want one?
Still don't have an account or don't want one?

AccesibilityPage.title: Make your code accessible
AccesibilityPage.subtitle: You can upload HTML code in multiple ways.

paste.title: Paste code
paste.description: Enter the HTML code in a text box.
paste.alt: Button to make manually entered code accessible

load_file.title: Upload from computer
load_file.description: Select the file from your computer.
load_file.alt: Button to make code accessible from an HTML file

load_url.title: Browse webpage
load_url.description: Select the URL of the webpage to analyze.
load_url.alt: Button to make code accessible from a URL

ConfigPage.subtitle: All system settings in one place.

apply.body: Do you want to apply the changes in the settings?

restore.body: Do you want to revert to the default settings?
